text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActClass where concept is-a INFO

name: ActClassInformation
title: ActClassInformation
description: Sender sends payload to addressee as information. Addressee does not have responsibilities beyond serving addressee's own interest (i.e., read and memorize if you see fit). This is equivalent to an FYI on a memo.
